title: SCP-8500
content:
[[module CSS]]
div#header
{
  background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8500/y2klogo.png') !important;
  image-rendering: pixelated;
}
div#container-wrap
{
  background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8500/header.png') !important;
}
#header h2 span::before
{
  content: '控制。收容。保护。'!important;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:y2k]]

[[HTML]]
<iframe scrolling="no" allowfullscreen frameBorder="5" src="https://ironshears.github.io/8500" style="width: 100%; aspect-ratio: 4/3;"></iframe>

[[/HTML]]

=====
[[include component:preview
text=
前任负责人被调职后，你收到了新的任务：监督管理一个位于虚拟现实的异常的收容措施。上级要求你专心工作，但同时异常也渴望得到你的关注。
]]
=====

[[div class="footer-wikiwalk-nav"]]
[[=]]
<< [[[SCP-8499]]] | SCP-8500 | [[[SCP-8501]]] >>
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
